titleStmt.title: E. A. McGlasson et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG9441

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p:
To the Hon B Magoffin
Governor of the state of Kentucky
The undersigned respectfully solicit a release of the fine of $200 -- 00/100 imposed upon Joseph Blackwell of South Covington at the present sitting of the Kenton Circuit Court

E. A. McGlasson
Wm R Martin
Henry Henn.
G Ficher
Vinkinom
H Haerkin
Conrad Gnadinger
Richard Lipscomb
James A. Lipscomb
James M. Willsan
H. Hontman
Thos. Orsboon
C C Osborn
L Hampton
G W Gordon
E. Cheeseman
Jo. Gossage
Haden Petty
J N Bridges
John B Hume
Wm Glinn
C. G. Wolf
Henry Sangen
Franz
Anderson Stith
Henry Wolf
Henry Hawley
M. Oneal
H. Ostendorff
B. H. Heiner
B. Droppelmann
Jordin Harris
Jno A Warner,

J H Fann

M. Baler

Glotting
Bernin

Wm Minter P S O
John WIlliams
Oren Bassett
Wm, H, McCarty
Marcus Beech
